item.title: Randolph add a quote by Robert Anton Wilson
item.description: "The Bible tells us to be like God, and then on page after page it describes God as a mass murderer. This may be the single most important key to the political behavior of Western Civilization." -- Robert Anton Wilson

item.title: Randolph add a quote by Robert Anton Wilson
item.description: "Anyone in the United States today who isn't paranoid must be crazy." -- Robert Anton Wilson

item.title: Randolph add a quote by Robert Anton Wilson
item.description: "I don't believe anything, but I have many suspicions." -- Robert Anton Wilson

item.title: Randolph add a quote by Robert Anton Wilson
item.description: "Human beings live in their myths. They only endure their realities." -- Robert Anton Wilson

item.title: Randolph add a quote by Robert Anton Wilson
item.description: "...reality is always plural and mutable." -- Robert Anton Wilson

item.title: Randolph add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "The reason I talk to myself is because I’m the only one whose answers I accept." -- George Carlin

item.title: Randolph add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "May the forces of evil become confused on the way to your house." -- George Carlin

item.title: Randolph add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "Think of how stupid the average person is, and realize half of them are stupider than that." -- George Carlin

item.title: Randolph add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "I have as much authority as the Pope. I just don’t have as many people who believe it." -- George Carlin

item.title: Randolph add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "That's why they call it the American Dream, because you have to be asleep to believe it." -- George Carlin

item.title: Randolph add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "Honesty may be the best policy, but it's important to remember that apparently, by elimination, dishonesty is the second-best policy." -- George Carlin
